<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Manages policy mappings for Github Teams authenticated via Github. See the [Vault
documentation](https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/auth/github.html) for more
information.

{{% examples %}}
{{% /examples %}}

## Team Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The Team resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Team<wbr>City</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>GitHub team name in "slugified" format.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Backend</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Path where the github auth backend is mounted. Defaults to `github`
if not specified.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Policies</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>An array of strings specifying the policies to be set on tokens
issued using this role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Bound<wbr>Cidrs</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the blocks of IP addresses which are allowed to use the generated token
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Explicit<wbr>Max<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Explicit Maximum TTL in seconds
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Max<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The maximum lifetime of the generated token
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>No<wbr>Default<wbr>Policy</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>If true, the 'default' policy will not automatically be added to generated tokens
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Num<wbr>Uses</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The maximum number of times a token may be used, a value of zero means unlimited
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Period
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Policies</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Policies
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The initial ttl of the token to generate in seconds
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of token to generate, service or batch
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

</dl>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Policies
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The initial ttl of the token to generate in seconds
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of token to generate, service or batch
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

</dl>




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>team</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>GitHub team name in "slugified" format.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>backend</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Path where the github auth backend is mounted. Defaults to `github`
if not specified.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>policies</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>An array of strings specifying the policies to be set on tokens
issued using this role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>bound_<wbr>cidrs</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Specifies the blocks of IP addresses which are allowed to use the generated token
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>explicit_<wbr>max_<wbr>ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Explicit Maximum TTL in seconds
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>max_<wbr>ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The maximum lifetime of the generated token
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>no_<wbr>default_<wbr>policy</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>If true, the 'default' policy will not automatically be added to generated tokens
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>num_<wbr>uses</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The maximum number of times a token may be used, a value of zero means unlimited
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>period</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Period
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>policies</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Policies
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>token_<wbr>ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The initial ttl of the token to generate in seconds
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The type of token to generate, service or batch
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

</dl>

The following state arguments are supported:




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Backend</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Path where the github auth backend is mounted. Defaults to `github`
if not specified.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Policies</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>An array of strings specifying the policies to be set on tokens
issued using this role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Team<wbr>City</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>

</dd>

    </dt>

    <dd>If true, the 'default' policy will not automatically be added to generated tokens
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">
        <span>Token<wbr>Num<wbr>Uses</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The maximum number of times a token may be used, a value of zero means unlimited
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">

    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Period

            title="Optional, Deprecated">

    </dt>
    <dd>Generated Token's Policies

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The initial ttl of the token to generate in seconds
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

    <dt class="property-optional property-deprecated"
            title="Optional, Deprecated">

    </dt>
    <dd>The type of token to generate, service or batch
<p class="property-message">Deprecated: This parameter should be moved to the Github Auth backend config block. It does nothing in a user/team block.</p></dd>

</dl>
